Case# CFLocaleLanguageDirection.bottomToTop

iOSiPadOSMac CatalystmacOStvOSvisionOSwatchOS

```
case bottomToTop
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFLocaleLanguageDirection/bottomToTop#Discussion)

The language direction is from bottom to top.
